entry.def: major and minor relief with blood; defecation and urination with blood

sense.def: Pathological Condition with blood leaving with stools and urine. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 68: 治吐血及大小便血，三 物湯方 , “To cure blood spitting and defecation and urination with blood , [use] the recipe for the ‘Decoction with three items’”.
